name: DeleteEnterpriseProject
description:
Delete a project while retaining associated boards and users.

Use this tool to delete a project in an enterprise Miro account. This action retains all boards and users under the same team. It requires 'projects:write' scope and is available only for enterprise users with Company Admin role.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization from which you want to delete a project.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization from which you want to delete a project.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the team from which the project is to be deleted.

value_schema.description: The ID of the team from which you want to delete a project.

parameters.name: project_id_to_delete
parameters.description: The ID of the project that needs to be deleted from the organization.

value_schema.description: The ID of the project that you want to delete.
